title: Monster Cookies
steps: Cream butter, sugars and vanilla. Add eggs and beat until fluffy.
In a separate bowl, combine flour, soda and salt.
Add to creamed mixture. Stir in chocolate chips.
Divide into thirds. Spread each third onto a greased 12” pizza pan.
Bake at 375 degrees for 8 to 10 minutes. (Dough can also be baked in pie pans yielding nine 6” cookies.)
